task.label: Home
task.description: This task is normally the first thing the user sees when WeSay comes up. It gives the user some status of the project, and reminds him what he was working on. Finally, this tab will allow him to switch to a different work task, if you have enabled more than one.

task.label: Dictionary
task.description: This task allows advanced users to see and edit all enabled fields of all entries in the dictionary. He can add, delete, and search for entries. NOTE: while this task may be very enticing to those familiar with traditional programs, this is *not* intended to be a primary way of working with WeSay.

task.label: Add Meanings
task.description: Add meanings to entries where they are missing.

task.label: Add Examples
task.description: Add example sentences to entries where they are missing.

task.label: Collect Word List
task.description: Collect new words given words in another language.
